title: Social Media Executive (Female) Job at Premier Hub Innovation Center
content:
Premier Hub Innovation Center exists to fast-track innovation and enterprise in Nigeria by creating an enabling environment and empowering youths who are leveraging technology to build ideas into sustainable solutions.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Executive (Female)
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

What You Will Do
Internal & external communications:
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Collaborate with management to develop and implement an effective communications strategy based on our target audience.
	Write, edit, and distribute content, including publications, press releases, website content, annual reports, speeches, and other marketing material that communicates the organization's activities, products and/or services.
	Respond to media inquiries, arrange interviews, and act as a spokesperson for the organization.
	Establish and maintain effective relationships with journalists, and maintain a media database.
	Seek opportunities to enhance the reputation of the brand, and coordinate publicity events as required.
	Maintain records of media coverage and collate analytics and metrics.


Social Media Management:


	Developing engaging social media strategies and managing social media platforms of the organization.
	Scheduling social media posts and engaging followers with regular company updates.
	Creating brand awareness to gain audience attention and responding to the comments on social media on time.
	Creating paid social media campaigns for advertising, monitoring social media metrics and ROI.
	Preparing social media engagement and activities reports.


What You Will Need


	Bachelor's Degree in Communications, Journalism, English Language or related field.
	Minimum of 2 years of relevant experience in a communications role.
	Knowledge of desktop publishing software (InDesign/Photoshop).
	Excellent verbal, written, and interpersonal skills.
	Good time management and organizational skills.
	In-depth Knowledge of SEO, Social/Digital Media
	Proficient in Microsoft Office, content management systems, and social media platforms.


Salary
N180,000 - N200,000 Monthly.

 

Note


	Shortlisted candidates will be invited to take an Online Assessment
	Successful candidates will be invited for a Virtual Chat with HR
	Final Chat
	Offer
	Candidates who live in close proximity of the job location are encouraged to apply.
